mapper.select: SELECT a.module_id moduleId, c.`code`, c.`name`, c.type FROM rbp_module_customize_group a INNER JOIN rbp_module_customize_column b on a.id = b.module_group_id INNER JOIN rbp_customize_column c on b.customize_column_id = c.id WHERE a.module_id = #{moduleId} and b.user_flag = 1

SELECT distinct c.`code` FROM rbp_module_customize_group a INNER JOIN rbp_module_customize_column b on a.id = b.module_group_id INNER JOIN rbp_customize_column c on b.customize_column_id = c.id WHERE a.module_id = #{moduleId} and b.user_flag = 1
